_comment_sync_interval: How often to update overlays (in seconds). Minimum 1 second recommended.
_comment_timeout: HTTP request timeout (in seconds). Should be less than sync_interval.
_comment_log_level: Logging verbosity: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL
_comment_cameras: List of camera configurations. Each camera syncs independently.

cameras._comment: Example 1: Front door camera with dynamic timestamp overlay
cameras.name: front-door

overlays._comment_content: Use {timestamp} for full date/time, {date} for date only, {time} for time only
overlays._comment_position: Set to null to keep current position, or specify pixel coordinates

cameras._comment: Example 2: Backyard camera with date/time and camera name
cameras.name: backyard

cameras._comment: Example 3: Garage camera with custom port and multiple overlays
cameras.name: garage

overlays._comment_disabled: Set enabled to false to skip this overlay

_notes: Camera names must be unique across all cameras
Overlay IDs must be unique within each camera (typically '1' through '8')
Overlay text is limited to 44 characters (will be truncated if longer)
Position coordinates are in pixels from top-left corner
Changes require restarting the sync manager
